articles.author: Greg Wyshynski
articles.title: Canada prevails vs. rival Team USA to win women's hockey gold at Beijing Olympics - ESPN
articles.description: Canada reclaimed women's ice hockey gold from the Americans with a 3-2 victory Thursday at the Beijing Olympics in the latest thrilling chapter of the sport's greatest rivalry.
articles.content:
Canada defeated archrival Team USA to win women's ice hockey gold Thursday at the Beijing Olympics in the latest thrilling chapter of the sport's greatest rivalry.
